@sarah_edo @snookca @LeaVerou I tried to clear some of this up a webinar. Because the word "static" (as in serving static files) suggests a "static" experience. But that's no longer the case, even for sites which can be served exclusively from a CDN. Slides and video here: https://t.co/valr8TRVWg
